title: Tokyo Tower Day
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Wow......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ha-Hanamaru-san, if you look all the way up like that, you’re going to fall over.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Ah, right. Well, it’s my first time standing directly below Tokyo Tower and looking up at it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>True, I’m used to seeing it from afar too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! It was so exciting earlier to see it get bigger and bigger as our train got closer~ What a gigantic structure. It’s the future, zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It was definitely built with the best technology and engineering techniques at the time.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>At the time......! Oh, right! Tokyo Tower was constructed a long time ago!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Fufu, you’re right. Come on, let’s ascend to the top!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Alright! Can we see Nijigaku from up there?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Let’s go find out!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
